relationships.description: Hermione suggests Harry as the leader of the group.
Cho looks at Hermione as though she were mad when she suggests Harry as the leader, making Harry feel embarrassed.
Hermione suggests electing a leader and voting on it properly, specifically suggesting Harry as the leader.
Zacharias Smith halfheartedly votes for Harry to be the leader.
